author: .fjl
content: Wasn't this the point of the fee mechanism?

author: lightclient
content: The fee mechanism is to avoid someone filling the queue for days + weeks with spam. Right now it updates on a per block basis. We could make it update on demand as new txs come in, but it would need a little more logic to determine if the current slot's count should be added to excess or not. Also there originally wasn't a way to get the current fee so we thought that only changing per block might be a little more stable and reduce the risk that someone's request becomes stale. I don't think that is as much of a problem now
